content:
Yes, many of these restaurants offer outdoor seating. Here are a few that specifically have outdoor seating:

1. Leaf Vegetarian Restaurant: This restaurant has an outdoor patio area where you can enjoy your meal. 2. Caravan of Dreams: This vegan restaurant has a small outdoor seating area on the sidewalk. 3. Sunrise Cafe: This cafe has outdoor seating available on their patio. 4. ZaZa's Tavola Italiana: This Italian restaurant has an outdoor seating area in their courtyard. 5. Roy's Squeeze Inn: This restaurant has picnic tables outside where you can enjoy your meal. 6. The Rabbit Hole: This gastropub has a patio area with outdoor seating. 7. Fire & Spice Tex-Mex Kitchen: This restaurant has outdoor seating available on their patio. Keep in mind that outdoor seating availability may vary based on the weather and season.
